name: ra4v
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

stmt.origin: biimpi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:

comment: Version of ~ ra4 with a disjoint variable condition, requiring fewer axioms. This is ~ stdpc5v for a restricted domain. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Mar-2020.)
